title: Hot Stone Massage Package for £15 at Health and Happiness (£38 Value)
highlights:
• Back, neck, shoulders and hamstring massage with hot stones
  • Late appointments available
  • Within Dundee Chiropractic Clinic
  • Convenient location in centre of Dundee

title: Water Sports Experience With Four Activities for £29 at Lochearnhead Water Sports Centre (£73 Value)
highlights:
• Accessible from Glasgow, Edinburgh and Dundee
  • Four varied activities: zorbing, banana boating, bucking bronco and kayaking
  • Two hour experience
  • Suitable for adults and children
